sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS2100 ( DPOB_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD , BUSN_CIFI_NM , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_UCST_SUM , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_JBFML_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_BGNN_DT , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_END_DT , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_USE_YN , DPOB_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CTNT , TYP_OCCU_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #busnTypOccuCifiCd# , #busnCifiNm# , #dtilOcclsApptnUcstCd# , #busnTypOccuCifiUcstSum# , #busnTypOccuCifiJbfmlCd# , #busnTypOccuCifiBgnnDt# , #busnTypOccuCifiEndDt# , #busnTypOccuCifiUseYn# , #dpobTypOccuCifiCtnt# , #typOccuCd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS2100 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD=#busnTypOccuCifiCd# , BUSN_CIFI_NM=#busnCifiNm# , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD=#dtilOcclsApptnUcstCd# , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_UCST_SUM=#busnTypOccuCifiUcstSum# , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_JBFML_CD=#busnTypOccuCifiJbfmlCd# , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_BGNN_DT=#busnTypOccuCifiBgnnDt# , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_END_DT=#busnTypOccuCifiEndDt# , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_USE_YN=#busnTypOccuCifiUseYn# , DPOB_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CTNT=#dpobTypOccuCifiCtnt# , TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD=#busnTypOccuCifiCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS2100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD=#busnTypOccuCifiCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD , BUSN_CIFI_NM , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_UCST_SUM , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_JBFML_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_BGNN_DT , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_END_DT , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_USE_YN , DPOB_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CTNT , TYP_OCCU_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD=#busnTypOccuCifiCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD , BUSN_CIFI_NM , DTIL_OCCLS_APPTN_UCST_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_UCST_SUM , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_JBFML_CD , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_BGNN_DT , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_END_DT , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_USE_YN , DPOB_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CTNT , TYP_OCCU_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS2100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
BUSN_TYP_OCCU_CIFI_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
